Text: Voluntary Executive Survey on CRM Strategy This is an invitation to a voluntary survey All participants will receive a Lands End Rugby shirt for taking this minute survey If however you do not want to be invited to take future surveys in this or other subject areas please reply to this email and write REMOVE in the subject line OR you may register for other surveys at registerhtm Dear Executive Wed like to give you a FREE Lands End Rugby Shirt AND make a charitable contribution on your behalf just for completing a minute survey regarding your CRM strategy as it relates to the customer data it manages Please just click on the link below to be sent to the survey site dnbhtm Thank you in advance for your participation Debi Henry Director of Customer Service GatePoint Information Group One Union Avenue Sudbury MA Voice Fax wwwgatepointnet
